fields.name: J.K. Rowling
fields.bio: British author, philanthropist, film producer, television producer, and screenwriter, best known for writing the Harry Potter fantasy series.

fields.name: George Orwell
fields.bio: English novelist, essayist, journalist and critic whose work is characterised by lucid prose, biting social criticism, opposition to totalitarianism, and outspoken support of democratic socialism.

fields.name: Fantasy
fields.description: Fantasy literature featuring magical or supernatural elements.

fields.name: Dystopian Fiction
fields.description: Literature set in societies where life is miserable, characterized by human misery, squalor, oppression, disease, and overcrowding.

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
